summary: Diff implements a new homepage Style C variant across the variant hook, PublicOverviewPage scope class application + toggle cycling, MarketingBanner variant handling, and adds Style C CSS variable overrides for light/dark in index.css. No clear missing functional requirements for REQ-2/3/4 are evident from the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Updates to project tracking/summary metadata files not requested as part of adding Style C (e.g., project_state.json and frontend-file-summaries.txt changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on adding a Style C variant for the unauthenticated homepage and related styling/toggle behavior; it does not request changes to project state or repository summary files.
